name: Cinderella Phenomenon
storyline:
In the kingdom of Angielle, a young princess named Lucette has lived a life of privilege and luxury. But when her mother dies, Lucette's world is turned upside down. Her father, the king, remarries a woman who brings her own daughters into the royal family. Lucette's stepmother and stepsisters treat her cruelly and make her work as a servant in her own home.

One day, a fairy godmother appears to Lucette and offers to grant her a wish. Lucette wishes to forget all of her troubles, but instead the fairy godmother curses her with a powerful spell. Now, Lucette must go on a journey to break the curse and find true love.

As she travels through the kingdom, Lucette meets a group of men who each have their own secrets and struggles. She must navigate their complicated relationships and decide who to trust. Will Lucette be able to break the curse and find her happily ever after? Or will she be doomed to suffer forever? The choice is yours in "Cinderella Phenomenon."
summary:
''Cinderella Phenomenon" is a visual novel game developed by Dicesuki. Players take on the role of Lucette, a princess who is cursed by a fairy godmother and must break the curse to find true love. The game features a variety of branching storylines and multiple endings, depending on the choices the player makes throughout the game.

The game is set in the kingdom of Angielle, a fantasy world filled with magic and intrigue. As Lucette, players must navigate a complex web of relationships and political intrigue, as well as confront their own personal demons. Along the way, they will meet a cast of memorable characters, including potential love interests and allies, as well as enemies who seek to thwart their quest.

The game features stunning hand-drawn art, immersive music, and engaging gameplay. With its rich storyline, compelling characters, and branching paths, "Cinderella Phenomenon" is a must-play game for fans of visual novels, fantasy, and romance.
